1370: Saswe was born in Oly straetje in 1370.
Got married to Ghiselijn at age 14 in 1370.
Gave birth to Katerina in 1370 at age 14.
1371: Gave birth to Auesoete in 1371 at age 15.
1372: Gave birth to Cecilia in 1372 at age 16.
1373: Lost daughter Katerina when Katerina was 4 years old.
1375: Gave birth to Heilsota in 1375 at age 19.
1377: Gave birth to Niels in 1377 at age 21.
1381: Gave birth to Waldrada in 1381 at age 25.
1382: Gave birth to Batten in 1382 at age 26.
1383: Lost daughter Heilsota when Heilsota was 9 years old.
1384: Lost son Batten when Batten was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1388: Gave birth to Sygerus in 1388 at age 32.
1395: Lost daughter Auesoete when Auesoete was 24 years old.
